descriptionHtml:
DRAGONBORN DLC IS REQUIRED

There is no loot to find here, because it\'s also meant to be an Ice King characters player home.

The Castle is located on top of Mount Anthor\'s left peak.

Ice King\'s Crown uses the crown of Barenziah\'s mesh and textures.

There is only a couple of things I need to do to finish this mod.

Make it so when you equip the crown you are added to the Ice Kingdom Faction as it\'s King, 
so the re-spawning enemies inside don\'t attack you anymore.
(If anyone could help me figure this out i\'d be thankful.)

I also need to add a couple more merchants.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WHAT IS ALREADY IN THE CASTLE

AREAS
The Entrance Room.
the halls.
the Storage Room with smith merchants.
the Barracks with lots of enemies, may add a cook that sells food.
The Throne Room where the king sits.
and the King\'s Cambers, where the king sleeps.
And a balcony with a great veiw.

ENEMIES
Ice Elf Archers = LV20
Ice Elf Soldiers = LV30
Ice Elf Warriors = LV40
Ice Golems = LV50
Ice King = LV80

MERCHANTS
Ice Elf Armor Smith = Sells Stalhrim Armor
Ice Elf Weapon Smith = Sells Stalhrim Weapons
Ice Elf Smelter = Sells Ores and Ingots 
(doesn\'t sell his Stalhrim for some reason, so i put a Stalhrim Barrel next to him that re-spawns 25 Stalhrim)


SPELLS
Master Level
Ice King\'s Frost = Frostbite style frost dragon breath shot from your hands
Ice King\'s Frost Ball = Frost Dragon\'s explosive frost blast.
Conjure Ice Golem = Summons an Ice Golem (LV 50 Frost Atronachh)

ITEMS
Ice King\'s Robe = Unenchanted Temple Priest Robe
Ice King\'s Crown = Enchanted Crown of Barenziah
author: GeneralDurandal
